body_html:
I'm very sympathetic to keeping CD simple. :)

Can you install CUDA on all your machines, even if they don't have a GPU? That ought to solve the problem. The issue is that the library cannot be loaded. It doesn't complain about not finding a GPU.

Fundamentally, we link against this library, so it's expected to be there -- you can run the same tensorflow installation on all your servers as long as the environment is also the same. But apparently (unless I'm missing something), you have two different environments, one of which lacks a working CUDA installation.
